action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.
DESCRIPTION: The image is a pixel art representation of a stylized tree with a purple cross at the top, green and orange blocks forming the trunk and branches, and a pink square at the bottom.

It appears to be a three-dimensional object with a flat base and a vertical element that could be a handle or a part of the object's structure. The image is abstract and does not depict any recognizable brand or specific type of object.
